channel.title: [PI] Whip help
channel.description:
How do i make my whip spec frezees players/npc for only 10 seconds ?
For example, me and you are fighing in the wilderness i speced you with my whip and i run away, then you can't move... You must wait 10 seconds and then you can move. Got [PI]
If you are going to help me, just reply the code here, and tell me for which class i add it.
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Whip help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:519619”] freezeTimer = 10;

CombatAssistant

Not that hard was it?[/quote]Where exatlly i add this ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Whip help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

freezeTimer = 10;

CombatAssistant

Not that hard was it?
